--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime / Kup : :
> 
> Rodimus pulled up at the Maximal base, and transformed to robot 
mode.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Lighten up Nightlight. You'll enjoy life a little 
more.
> 
> Rodimus' lighter "Hot Rod" side was showing right now as it 
sometimes does. Rodimus wasn't sure why though.
> 
> Rodimus grabs the artifact from Kup, and Kup transforms to bot mode 
also. They both start to carry it to the lab.
> 
> Kup: Nightlight, get Vampirtron to the medbay and see what you can 
do for him.
